prompts.title: Abandoned Cart Email
prompts.description: Crafts a prompt which can be used to remind customers about abandoned cart items.
prompts.prompt_text:
Subject Line: ‚ÄúRe: Your Abandoned Cart ‚Äì Don‚Äôt Forget Your Favorites! üõí‚Äù

prompts.title: Improve Your Sales Copy
prompts.description: Ask GPT to improve something by giving an objective to improve.
prompts.prompt_text: Can you provide suggestions for how I can improve [subject] with the goal of [objective]?

prompts.title: Urgency and Scarcity Email
prompts.description: Create an email for flash sale.
prompts.prompt_text: Create an email copy and subject line that stresses urgency and scarcity.[additional context]

prompts.title: Interactive Content
prompts.description: Create an email for flash sale.
prompts.prompt_text: Create an email copy and subject line invites the reader to read and engage with your content.[additonal context]
